Package cz.cvut.k36.omo.bartom47.smartfactory.production

Class Product

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.k36.omo.bartom47.smartfactory.production.Product
Direct Known Subclasses:
Alternator, Fabia, Octavia, RidiciJednotka, Starter, Superb
public abstract class Product
extends java.lang.Object
Represents product that can be produced by the factory.
Since:
1.0-BETA workerSequence and materials are not used yet
Author:
Matej
